group_1.textLeft: Yeahhh! That's a SUPER victory!

[chara:302301:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Hee hee, thank you, [chara:302301:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:302301:cheek_0][chara:302301:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json][chara:302301:lipSynch_1]Natsuki!@Er! I mean...

group_1.textRight: Yeah, that's fine. You can call me Natsuki!

group_1.textLeft: Okay! Like I said, just call me Aimi.
So uh, anyway...

Thanks for helping me out there! [chara:302301:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:302301:cheek_0][chara:302301:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json][chara:302301:lipSynch_1][chara:302301:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Because of@you, I managed to pull through.

group_1.textRight: I thought you looked SO cool, refusing to@give in 'til the end!

group_1.textLeft: Hee hee, really?
But you know, I was actually about to call@it quits.

group_1.textRight: What?! I couldn't tell at all!

group_1.textLeft: I only managed to keep fighting because...

I remembered you cheering for me, saying,[chara:302301:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:302301:cheek_0][chara:302301:motion_1][chara:302301:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:302301:lipSynch_1]@"Don't give up!"
Yes, for real! [chara:302301:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:302301:cheek_1][chara:302301:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json][chara:302301:lipSynch_1]If I'd been alone, I probably@would've run.
I've never met another Magical Girl before.
So there's never been anyone there to cheer@me on.
It was like getting a super charge!
Uh... What are you thanking me for?

group_1.textRight: It just makes me happy that you think so@nicely about me, I guess.

group_1.textLeft: *Giggle* Ah, gotcha!
Oh yeah, by the way, do you have some@free time now?
I thought maybe we could get some tea@at a cafe?
I don't have any Magical Girl friends.
So I've never been able to talk about,@you know, "Magical Girl problems"...
I'd really love it if we could chat about@that stuff.

group_1.textRight: I don't know how good my advice will be,@though.

group_1.textLeft: [chara:302301:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Awesome!
Let's have a good long chat! We can talk@about other stuff too.
Like...love!
